channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:

The wall to the left if Greens shop is partly fallen down

item.title: On a corner blind spot, 17th September
item.description:
This person is parking in a blind spot on the road which will cause a accident this is on the corner of duncroft road hucclecote Gloucester This has been for 1 week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Duncroft Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped cabinet and wood, 17th September
item.description:
Flytipping on pavement by Oasis Centre and MUGA near to PE Way and police station

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Oasis Centre Cassin Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposting on 50 limit signpost a38, 16th September
item.description:
50 mph limit signpost on the a38 South of the Deerhurst traffic lights covered in tinsel stickers balloons and birdcage been like this for nearly 2 years it is distracting to drivers and should be cleaned up there was a motorcycle fatality there in April 2021 while I appreciate the need to mark the sight there is no need to leave junk all over the signpost it is distracting to drivers and could cause another accident and needs to be cleaned up ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Highfield Business Park A38, Deerhurst
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructing, 16th September
item.description:
Unable to see if vehicles are coming due to tree

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Fulbrook Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown shrubs, 15th September
item.description:
Pedestrians are being forced into the road by this rather large over grown bush, this a section of 40mph road near to the car wash.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Thornhaugh Mews, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken tile trip hazard Kipling Road, 15th September
item.description:
Just been done by Travis Perkins truck. It’s quite urgent it’s a 3 inch trip hazard and it won’t go back down despite stamping

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diseased trees, 15th September
item.description:
I’ve notice that the majority of the horse chestnut trees along Reddings Road are now heavily diseased. This is a sad sight and they require some attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Reddings Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raw sewage coming out of drain and pouring down the street gutter. It stinks as well, 14th September
item.description:
Coming out of a manhole in Albert Road and pouring down the gutter to other parts of the street it stinks too
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 St. Ives Court Albert Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drop curbs required for care home residence behind Hobart House Shelley Road, 14th September
item.description:
Drop curbs required for care home residence behind Hobart House Shelley Road. This has been a constant pain for several years and carers must push the residents up the road and over the speed bumps to get around this small junction. Can somebody sort it out please with drop curbs?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 45 Shelley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This bin needs a lid - fishy park, 14th September
item.description:
Can it be replaced? The wildlife empties it every day. Sometimes it’s used poo bags

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 66 Pinewood Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath Overgrown, 13th September
item.description:
The footpath (public footpath) linking Stoke Road and Hunters Road is overgrown in places forcing pedestrians off the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Hunters Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The support posts on the Swindon Village sign are twisted., 12th September
item.description:
This issue has been reported by other residents. The sign is opposite the access to Attwood Close. The brackets that should secure the sign to the posts are loose. The white coating on the posts has deteriorated and the metal beneath it is rusting. The sign and the posts need replacing before their condition worsens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signpost fallen over due to rusty poles, 12th September
item.description:
Sign posts rusted and falling over. Sign is in bad shape too, requires new posts and sign to be placed . Quite a concern as sharpe edges and angles and disabled people in orchard house 100mtrs away walk down . Partially sighted as well . Reported 12 September 2022

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Coppice Gate, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree engulfment, 12th September
item.description:
The elderflower trees have once again grown over & engulfed the street lamp no.11. Street light is located along the Reddings footpath that run parallel with the train line. This one is the last one before you turn left to cross the bridge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Reddings Park, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken drainage cover, 12th September
item.description:
Outside number 11. This broken drainage cover is a trip hazard. Please could it be fixed asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Suffolk Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parked cars narrowing the road, 12th September
item.description:
Parked cars along fiddlers green lane especially on the slight bend is causing narrowing of the road , which is getting dangerous especially as you cannot see oncoming traffic and some people do speed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 49 Galileo Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
